Hi Peter,

I've bought 2 tsubas from him ~2 months ago and they are fine. The 
transaction was quick anyway, I didn't have any problems. But Rich 
and Lou are right: you should ask him directly, and do not trust his 
opinion on schools, age etc.

Regards,
  Stan

--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "Peter Farrar" <pcfarrar@b...> 
wrote:
> Hi,
>
